title: ME Cable
desc:
Post 2448
Refer to **ME Controller**(2447) on how to use this. If there is no **ME Controller**(2447) on the board, you may spend a turn to replace this with it. You will play a random effectless card that could be played as disguise.

When this is connected to a **ME Controller**(2447), Anyone standing on it gains 1 random effect from the **ME Controller**(2447)

While stood on, the player on the **ME Controller**(2447) may give you a card once. You cannot move onto **ME Controller**(2447) when standing on this.
